title: Servant of the Secret Fire (1R83)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to make a minion strength -3.
Lore:	”'I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass.'”
Rarity:	R
